EmailTemplate.subject: Sheetz Business Edge Card - Don't Miss Out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don’t Miss Out!! Get 15¢ off per gallon for the next 5 months.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Whether your business is large or small, take charge of your fueling expenses with the Sheetz Business Edge card program. For a limited time only, Sheetz is offering 15¢ off on EVERY gallon purchased at a Sheetz with the Sheetz Business Edge card!
The Sheetz Business Edge card is the perfect way to simplify your vehicle fueling and eliminate hours of paperwork.
- Rebates of 25¢ on every gallon* for the first 5 months
- Accepted at over 500 Sheetz retail locations
- Helps prevent unwanted spending with pre-set controls
- 24/7 U.S. based customer services – for you and your drivers
I will be following up with you next week. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.MobilePhone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to meeting with you about the needs of your business. Don’t wait any longer to start saving 15¢ per gallon on fuel.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Cell: {!User.MobilePhone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Subject to credit approval. New accounts only. The 5 month promotional period is valid for applications received May 1st, 2016 through June 30th, 2016. Rebates are not applied at the time of purchase – they will appear as an account credit on your monthly billing statement. Standard rebates of up to 6¢ per gallon of fuel will be applied after the promotional offer. Rebates are subjected to change at any time without prior notice.
